attributes.action: Allow asylum seekers settled in britian 5 yrs or more the right to remain
attributes.additional_details: Allow asylum seekers who have lived and settled in the country more than 5years who have aplied for british citizenship and are waiting on outcome of application the right to remain, It would also help get rid of thousands of backlog applications that are being ignored or not dealt with.And the goverment can start a fresh start on imagration and hopefully keep it upto date.
